welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pearl River, a charming city known for its beautiful river views and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights at Teterboro Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves domestic flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
